title: resources
content:
Resources

This is a list of well-regarded links, tools, and other content that you may find useful or interesting for learning or playing Arkham Horror: The Card Game.

  • Getting Started
    • Buyers Guide
    • PlayingBoardGames YouTube Channel
    • Mythos Busters Podcast
    • Arkham Central Fan-Created Content
  • Utilities and Game Info
    • Arkham Cards App
    • ArkhamDB
    • ArkhamRec
    • Encounter Sets Google Doc: I am working to migrate the info in this doc into an API for scriptable consumption, as well as a more user-friendly interface
    • Chaos Bag/Skill Test Calculator
    • Official FFG Marketing Images
  • Atmosphere and Premium Components
    • Dissonant Voices Narration
    • Arkham Horror: The Soundtrack
    • Burger Chaos Tokens
    • 3D-Printable Components
    • Etsy
  • Storage Solutions
    • Tuckbox Generator
    • Laser Cutter Box Template Generator
    • Vertical Dividers
